title: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: When searching for declarations, no results are shown.
EB: Search via context menu in the packages view works.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a specific package.
3. Use the search dialog to search for declarations within the selected package.
4. Observe that no results are displayed.
